```{r}
article_words <- function(df, j = 300000, stem=F){ 
  library(tidytext)
  library(SnowballC)
  data(stop_words)

  words <- df %>%
    unnest_tokens(word, description) %>%
    anti_join(stop_words) %>% # get rid of stop words
    filter(!(word %in% c("jersey", )))
  
  if(stem){
    words <- words %>% 
      mutate(word = wordStem(word))
  }
  
  words <- words %>% 
    count(id, word) %>% 
    group_by(id) %>% 
    mutate(exists = (n>0)) %>% 
    ungroup %>% 
    group_by(word) %>% 
    mutate(total = sum(n)) %>% 
    filter(total > j) %>% 
    pivot_wider(id_cols = id, names_from = word, values_from = exists, values_fill = list(exists=0)) %>% 
    right_join(select(df,id,province)) %>% 
    select(-id) %>% 
    mutate(across(-province, ~replace_na(.x, F)))
}

wino <- wine_words(wine, j=500, stem=F) %>% 
  filter(province %in% c("Oregon","California")) %>% 
  head() %>% 
  arrange(province)

wino
```
